ingredients: 1 dried ancho chile, stemmed and seeded
1 dried Anaheim chile, stemmed and seeded
1 dried chipotle chile, stemmed and seeded
salt and freshly ground black pepper
salt and freshly ground black pepper

salt and freshly ground black pepper
salt and freshly ground black pepper
